Articles.Content:
Hey all!

Well, given the very recent release of Pokemon X/Y over the past weekend, and since I am nearly about to go through the league, I've been looking for friends who had the game I could battle with and I thought I might as well see here who has the game and is willing to battle!

So if you have Pokemon X/Y, or any older game for the DS, post your friend code here along with which game you own

My 3DS friend code is 3110-5118-4429

If I see numbers of people with older games, I might post my code for those as well.

Edited October 15, 2013 by stupid_chris
